name: Epic Gheegur
description: The custom of crafting and gifting stuffed animals is a timed-honored tradition, dating back to the days of the Dawn of Fire. Those ones usually weren't possessed by a rambunctious Wublin spirit, however - this Epic attempt to cutesify the Gheegur can be considered successful IF and only if you subscribe to Supernatural design sensibilities. Then, it's head and shoulders above the others.
polairty: Negative from: Epic Dermit, Negative toward: Epic Creepuscule, Positive from: Epic Tympa, Positive toward: Epic Zynth
